q_en: What sewing tasks will be completed before May 31, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.completed_number, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.number AS order_product_quantity, p.attributes AS product_attributes, pt.description AS product_type FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE st.status = 2 AND st.end_time < '2024-05-31';
steps.description: Retrieve sewing tasks that are completed before May 31, 2024

response:
Sure! Here are the sewing tasks that will be completed before May 31, 2024:

| Task ID | Completed Number | End Time   | Working Group Name | Order Product Quantity | Product Attributes | Product Type |
|---------|------------------|------------|--------------------|------------------------|--------------------|--------------|
| 1       | 100              | 2024-02-07 | Master Sewers      | 100                    | Red, M size        | T-shirt      |
| 17      | 175              | 2024-04-22 | Skilled Sewers     | 175                    | Yellow, L size     | Jacket       |
| 18      | 200              | 2024-04-21 | Skilled Sewers     | 200                    | Brown, L size      | Jacket       |
| 16      | 200              | 2024-05-07 | Advanced Sewers    | 200                    | Red, M size        | Coat         |

These tasks are all set to be completed before the end of May 2024. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š
